original_title: I Always Cry For You Like Pink Honey Rain
overview: A medium-length film that accompanies all 7 tracks of the album “Pink Honey Rain” by The Bird Yellow. The story, full of visual metaphors, elegant choreographies and an astonishing imaginary, takes place during the farewell party between two people. A bittersweet “so long” that brings a necessary distance and marks both an end and a beginning.
title: I Always Cry For You Like Pink Honey Rain
